answerText: Zealand [do not accept "New Zealand"][10] This most populous city on Zealand is home to the Tivoli Gardens amusement park and the Edvard Eriksen statue The Little Mermaid.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 1 | 9 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This island is connected to the island of Funen by the Great Belt Fixed Link.  [10] Name this island whose Kronborg castle in Elsinore is the setting of Hamlet.
